title: Hamukione
author: Hamukione
content: Hey everyone..I am looking for people who have a blog, news site, or any form of content-based site around cryptocurrency or news related to crypto.I have no requirements for how many users per month you have reading your stuff.But I am looking to network with people, as I am building my own project.So, if you have a site, please write below or send me a PM.I'd love to have a chat, and who knows.. We might be able to help each other grow /Hamukione

comments.author: Pmalek
comments.body: You might get more hits by contacting the crypto news sites directly and proposing whatever business cooperation you had in mind. There are many blog posts advertising cryptocurrency news aggregators that you can use as a reference.Here are just some of the lists I found after a quick search but there are loads of others:100 Best Cryptocurrency Blogs and WebsitesTop 80 Cryptocurrency News WebsitesThe 50 Best Cryptocurrency Blogs

comments.author: Little Mouse
comments.body: Would you be interested in crypto news site in local language (Bengali)? I have one small blog on cryptocurrency and also, I'm writing in another crypto news site. Both are in Bengali. Let me know if you are interested. We can help each other.Apart from that, I'm admin in two local Facebook group on cryptocurrency. These two groups are the most active Facebook group in Bangladesh. I believe this will also help you.

comments.author: coupable
comments.body: I do not know if this information can provide you with advice, but as far as I know, the various service sites for cryptocurrency and the blockchain field offer their own blog that is usually interested in publishing the latest news in the cryptocurrency market, and perhaps also provide simplified definitions or a simplified guide for newcomers To be able to interact with new technology.What I wanted to say is that perhaps you can communicate with the owners of these sites and that your search is not limited to the owners of blogs and news sites.I also hope that you will share some of your ideas with us because in that case we can suggest your idea to our closed among the owners of blogging projects.

comments.author: The Cryptovator
comments.body: Sounds like you are going to create your own crypto ad network if I am not mistaken. Then you have to search & research Google. Also quite important to research existing ad networks that are alive on the mark right now. Seems Pmalek give you some list and you have to verify then and choose accordingly. Feel free to share your idea about your project. So we might suggest something from our past experience.

comments.author: NotATether
comments.body: You're not very clear with your question.Are you looking for blog owners to purchase articles from them, or just for website advice?There are quite a number of cryptowriters-for-hire in the Services section of the Marketplace board, if you just want writers.

comments.author: cabron
comments.body: Maybe he just want to exchange links or buy banner space with crypto blogger's websites. Or probably publish articles on to other's website to advertise his project.  Pmalek has given you a link of list of crypto sites, He can contact the owners of the websites by going into their contact details.  Some users in the forum are very discreet to which website they own. If he accepts medium.com blogs, there are lots of them here. Check the bounty spreadsheets.

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: NotATether on June 21, 2022, 08:02:29 AMYou're not very clear with your question.Are you looking for blog owners to purchase articles from them, or just for website advice?There are quite a number of cryptowriters-for-hire in the Services section of the Marketplace board, if you just want writers.I would say that OP is not so interested in concrete paid cooperation with other bloggers, nor is he interested in a database of "TOP" crypto news/blog sites. so I think all the tips where he can hire writers or look at other blogs are completely superfluous.I understood more that he wanted to communicate with the owners of blogs or similar sites, in order to share experiences.

comments.author: PX-Z
comments.body: Quote from: NotATether on June 21, 2022, 08:02:29 AMYou're not very clear with your question.Are you looking for blog owners to purchase articles from them, or just for website advice?There are quite a number of cryptowriters-for-hire in the Services section of the Marketplace board, if you just want writers.OP is sounding like to build network of people to work/partner with, either on the website related content, future products, SEO including link building, anything that is marketing-related stuffs. This will actually work if op will be working to those website blog that is in the growing stage. Coz I doubt he will get any good feedback working on those website say in this list[1] which is suggested above unless he will pay their thousands of dollar rate for article publishing or ads.[1] https://blog.feedspot.com/cryptocurrency_blogs/

comments.author: Pmalek
comments.body: Quote from: examplens on June 21, 2022, 01:33:17 PMI understood more that he wanted to communicate with the owners of blogs or similar sites, in order to share experiences. That's what I think as well so I gave him lists with loads of crypto news sites. Each respectable site has a contact form, email, or social media account where you can contact the owners, marketing team, or the writers directly and propose whatever you want. He also mentioned in the end of his OP that "we could also help each other grow". To me, that sounds like mutual promotion of each other's sites, maybe banners, backlinks, etc.

comments.author: NotATether
comments.body: Quote from: Pmalek on June 21, 2022, 03:56:44 PMHe also mentioned in the end of his OP that "we could also help each other grow". To me, that sounds like mutual promotion of each other's sites, maybe banners, backlinks, etc. Here is a tip that I will give you for free, as a webmaster.Mutual backlinks are guarrenteed to get BOTH of the websites penalized, if not de-listed, by Google, particularly if they are do-follow links. Don't even try this at home.

comments.author: maxtra
comments.body: Please check private message.Quote from: Hamukione on June 17, 2022, 12:30:52 PMHey everyone..I am looking for people who have a blog, news site, or any form of content-based site around cryptocurrency or news related to crypto.I have no requirements for how many users per month you have reading your stuff.But I am looking to network with people, as I am building my own project.So, if you have a site, please write below or send me a PM.I'd love to have a chat, and who knows.. We might be able to help each other grow /Hamukione

comments.author: Hamukione
comments.body: Thank you everyone for your replies here.I have responded to the PMs I received.Just to clarify..I am not looking to create an ad network or any other form of paid services.I am simply looking to network with other bloggers/news sites and see if it would make sense to write for each other, share content between us, and such.

comments.author: buwaytress
comments.body: Quote from: Hamukione on June 27, 2022, 02:56:47 PMI am simply looking to network with other bloggers/news sites and see if it would make sense to write for each other, share content between us, and such.Then you probably want to look at how Steemit (and later Hive) did it, you generally keep writing your content but within your group/network just make sure you share your power around and grow together until you're all able to promote your own posts.Not my advice, just how it's done. I really don't like spamming content if it's not relevant.Alternatively, if you really feel you're a good writer and have unique perspectives, I'd go for Hackernoon, and if you get 10 or more published or have a good rate of 90% approval, then you network from within. Doesn't give you crypto really like steemit did but exposure.
